name: Hicks Equity Partners
overview: Hicks Equity Partners LLC is a principal investment firm specializing in investments in mid market companies. The firm prefers to invest in companies having enterprise values less then $200 million. Hicks Equity Partners LLC is based in United States. Hicks Equity Partners LLC is a of Hicks Holdings LLC.

milestones.description: Hicks Equity Partners Acquires Directional Rentals
milestones.source_description: Hicks Equity Partners Acquires Directional Rentals
